name: Cs10-ucr-2014
body:
### Content
In this course, you'll become familiar with the basic concepts of computers and
computer programming, and learn to apply those principles using a powerful and widely used
programming language, C++. You will learn to design programs of up to a few hundred lines of
code to solve real problems, and you will learn to use a number of tools of the trade, including
various webÂ­based development and collaboration tools.
